item.title: Hypervisors
item.description: What is hypervisor? Types of hypervisor Hypervisor I -> Bare metal (Xen, Linux, KVM, RedHat oVirt) Hypervisor II -> Hosted or shared Why today? Qemu, docker, and my interview with Amazon Hypervisor I ​ Machine 1 machine2 ​ Hypervisor 1 ​ Hardware Hypervisor II ​ machine1 machine2 ​ Hypervisor ​ OS ​ Hardware
